quote_last: they were ushered into an empty conference room. Scott selected a chair against the wall, just behind where Warren Christopher would be seated but slightly to his left so he would have a clear view of Prime Minister Rabin across the table.
title: Honor Among Thieves
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: “And what do you suppose Father Mahoney is thinking now, sitting there like some Romanian beggar and just before teatime? He knows very well we’re expecting him. If he’s even one minute late—I’m counting, it’s
quote_last: on my watch—I’ll be telling him a thing or two.”
title: Pomegranate Soup
author: Marsha Mehran
